marketNews.title: US Dollar Index Strengthens to the Highest Level in 1 Year
marketNews.content: The US dollar index (DXY) strengthened +2.3% WoW to 106.9 on Thursday (11/14), marking the highest level in the last 1 year. This caused the rupiah exchange rate against the US dollar to plummet to 15,889 before closing -0.76% WoW at 15,855 on Thursday (11/14), marking the weakest level since mid-August 2024. In addition to the rupiah, the currencies of several other emerging market countries also weakened, such as the Malaysian ringgit (-1.84% WoW), the Thai baht (-2.32% WoW), and the Philippine peso (-0.09% WoW). The weakening of the rupiah exchange rate and its peers in the last week was primarily pressured by the discourse on inflationary policies promoted by US president-elect Donald Trump. As we wrote in Stockbit Snips previously, Trump has floated protectionist policies. The sentiment from Trump's victory was reinforced by the Republican Party's trifecta victory in the 2024 US election, where Trump's supporting party won the majority seats in the US Senate and House of Representatives. This result has the potential to reduce the influence of the opposition party, the Democratic Party, in limiting Trump from implementing his policies. Besides the sentiment from Trump's victory, the strengthening of the DXY was also influenced by the rise in US inflation again. In October 2024, US consumer price index inflation reached 0.2% MoM and 2.6% YoY (vs. Sep 2024: 0.2% MoM and 2.4% YoY inflation), in line with consensus expectations. Core inflation in October 2024 itself was stable at 0.3% MoM and 3.3% YoY, in line with consensus expectations. This result is still higher than the Fed's target of 2% inflation. The market is now beginning to expect smaller interest rate cuts in 2025. Based on the CME FedWatch Tool analysis as of Thursday (11/14), the probability of the Fed cutting rates by >=75 bps until June 2025 dropped from 62.7% before Trump won, to 45.9% currently. Meanwhile, the probability of the Fed cutting rates by <75 bps until June 2025 increased from 37.2% before Trump won, to 54.1% currently. Along with the weakening of the rupiah, the Indonesian capital market also experienced significant foreign outflow in the last 1 week. The IHSG fell -0.4% WoW to 7,215 with a foreign outflow of 5.23 trillion rupiah in the last week as of Thursday (11/14). Meanwhile, the yield on the 10-year Indonesian government bond rose +17 bps WoW to 6.96% as of Thursday (11/14), with a foreign outflow reaching 5.83 trillion rupiah in the last 1 week as of Tuesday (11/12). Key Takeaway: Although the market is starting to reduce optimism about interest rate cuts in 2025, we assess that the clearer monetary policy direction still needs to wait to see the magnitude and pace of implementation and the potential impact of the policies floated by Trump. The strength of the US dollar itself has the potential to narrow the room for Bank Indonesia to continue cutting the BI Rate. To mitigate volatility risk from interest rate uncertainty, investors can take the opportunity to lock in bond yields for FR instruments - especially short-term series like PBS032 - at high and attractive levels for investors. On the other hand, Retail SBN ST013, which is currently in the offering period, can also be an alternative because it has a floating with floor coupon.

marketNews.title: JPFA Predicts Chicken Meat Demand +24% YoY in 2025
marketNews.content: Senior Vice President Japfa Comfeed Indonesia, Achmad Dawami, stated that his party predicts chicken meat demand in 2025 will increase up to +24% YoY, driven by the implementation of the free nutritious meal program. Nevertheless, Achmad doubts that the program can achieve the target absorption of 1.2 million tons of chicken meat per year, as conveyed by the expert team of the Prabowo-Gibran National Campaign Team. Based on JPFA's projection, the absorption of chicken meat in the free nutritious meal program might only be around 900,000 tons per year, where Achmad mentioned that the absorption of 400,000 tons already has a good impact on the company.

marketNews.title: SKRN to Distribute Interim Dividend for 2024 Fiscal Year
marketNews.content: Superkrane Mitra Utama will distribute an interim dividend for the 2024 fiscal year amounting to 320.3 billion rupiah or 45 rupiah per share. The cum date in the regular and negotiation market is on November 22, 2024, with payment on December 6, 2024. Referring to SKRN stock price at the close of trading on Thursday (11/14) at 466 rupiah per share, the indicative dividend yield is 9.7%.

marketNews.title: BUMI Announces Private Placement Plan in Connection with Mandatory Convertible Bonds Execution
marketNews.content: Bumi Resources announced it will hold a private placement of 1.4 million new shares at a price of 157 rupiah per share in connection with the execution of mandatory convertible bonds. The corporate action will take place on November 21, 2024.

marketNews.title: Petrosea Commissioner and Director Increase Stakes via Stock Purchases
marketNews.content: Petrosea Commissioner, Erwin Ciputra, purchased 174,000 PTRO shares at an average price of 18,363 rupiah per share on November 8 and 11, 2024. The total transaction value reached approximately 3.2 billion rupiah. After this transaction, Erwin Ciputra's ownership in PTRO increased from 0.045% to 0.062%. In a separate transaction, PTRO Director, Kartika Hendrawan, also purchased 80,000 PTRO shares at an average price of 19,445 rupiah per share on November 11 and 12, 2024. The total transaction value reached approximately 1.6 billion rupiah. After this transaction, Kartika Hendrawan's ownership in PTRO increased from 0.0088% to 0.0167%.

marketNews.title: Indosat and GOTO Launch Local Language LLM Ecosystem Named Sahabat-AI
marketNews.content: Indosat is collaborating with GoTo Gojek Tokopedia to launch a large language model (LLM) ecosystem named Sahabat-AI which is specially designed in the Indonesian language. ISAT and GOTO stated that Sahabat-AI enables developers to create AI-based applications and services in Indonesian and various regional languages. The open-source LLM is supported by AI Singapore and Tech Mahindra from India, which uses Nvidia's AI Enterprise software - including Nvidia NeMo - to train the model and improve its general language understanding.

marketNews.title: TOBA States Coal Reserves in Concessions Will End by 2025-2027; No Plans for Extension or New Acquisitions
marketNews.content: TBS Energi Utama Director, Juli Oktarina, stated that coal reserves from a number of the company group's mining concessions will expire around 2025-2027, although mining contract permits are still relatively long. Juli also mentioned that TOBA does not plan to apply for contract extensions to exploit coal resources, and ensured that the company does not plan to acquire other coal mines. Nevertheless, Juli said that TOBA has anticipated potential revenue decline from the coal segment through the acquisition of several waste management projects and investments in new and renewable energy (EBT) projects.

marketNews.title: ITMG Coal Production and Sales Volumes for 9M24 Show Year-on-Year Growth
marketNews.content: Indo Tambangraya Megah recorded a coal production volume of 5.8 million tons (+9.4% YoY, +34.9% QoQ) in 3Q24, bringing the coal production volume for 9M24 to 15 million tons (+11.1% YoY). Meanwhile, sales volume in 3Q24 grew to 6.3 million tons (+18.9% YoY, +8.6% QoQ), so the sales volume for 9M24 reached 17.1 million tons (+12.5% YoY).

marketNews.title: ANTM Plans 35-40% Payout Ratio for 2024 Dividends, Lower than 2023's 100%
marketNews.content: Aneka Tambang Director, Arianto Sabtonugroho Rudjito, stated that his party plans to distribute dividends for the 2024 fiscal year with a payout ratio of around 35-40%, lower than the payout ratio for the 2023 dividends at 100%. Arianto mentioned that the plan to lower the payout ratio considers the funding needs for several of the company's future projects. Throughout 2024, ANTM has launched several expansions, such as the launch of the Mempawah smelter grade alumina refinery (SGAR) and the acquisition of a 30% stake in an affiliate nickel company, PT Jiu Long Metal Industry.

marketNews.title: Finance Minister Defends VAT Hike Plan to 12% Starting January 2025 Despite Criticism
marketNews.content: Finance Minister, Sri Mulyani, in a meeting with the DPR on Wednesday (11/13) defended the plan to raise Value Added Tax (VAT) from 11% to 12% starting January 2025, even though a number of economists and business actors criticized that the policy could harm consumers. Previously, President Prabowo Subianto promised in his campaign to increase tax revenue using technology and by improving tax collection, not merely by raising rates.

marketNews.title: PP No. 47/2024 Outlines Conditions for SME Bad Debt Write-off until May 2025
marketNews.content: Based on Government Regulation (PP) No. 47/2024 concerning the write-off of SME bad debts until May 2025, debt forgiveness can be granted if the debtor meets the following conditions: 1) The principal value of the bad receivable is at most 500 million rupiah per debtor or customer; 2) It has been written off for a minimum of 5 years from the time this PP is in effect; 3) It is not a credit or financing guaranteed by insurance or credit or financing guarantee; and 4) There is no loan collateral, or the loan collateral is in a condition that makes it impossible to sell, or the collateral has been fully sold but cannot settle the customer's obligation.

marketNews.title: BBTN Collaborates with BBRI for Prabowo's 3 Million Houses Program
marketNews.content: Bank Tabungan Negara President Director, Nixon L. P. Napitupulu, stated that his party will collaborate with Bank Rakyat Indonesia to realize the program for providing 3 million housing units per year proposed by President Prabowo Subianto. Nixon mentioned that this collaboration is carried out by considering the wider reach of BBRI's network to remote areas of Indonesia. Regarding the financing split between BBTN and BBRI, Nixon stated that it has not yet been decided and will await the minister's decision. Nixon also explained that the 3 million houses per year program will not entirely rely on the mortgage scheme (KPR), with a portion of it being distributed in the form of assistance.

marketNews.title: DRMA Targets Cooperation with Chinese Automakers like BYD for Automotive Component Supply
marketNews.content: Dharma Polimetal Director, Yosaphat Simanjuntak, stated that his party has established communication with BYD regarding the possibility of cooperation in supplying automotive components. Nevertheless, Yosaphat could not provide further information regarding this matter. Meanwhile, DRMA President Director, Irianto Santoso, said that his party is currently establishing cooperation with vehicle manufacturers from China, although he did not mention their identity. So far, DRMA has supplied automotive components to several car manufacturers such as Hyundai, Kia, and Toyota, as well as for two-wheeled vehicles like PT Astra Honda Motor (AHM).

marketNews.title: BPJS Kesehatan Faces Potential IDR 20 Trillion Deficit, Suggests Contribution Hike as Solution
marketNews.content: BPJS Kesehatan President Director, Ali Ghufron Mukti, stated that his party is threatened with a deficit of 20 trillion rupiah in 2024, driven by claims being larger than premiums. Nevertheless, Ali mentioned that there is a possibility of no default until 2026. Ali said that his party is proposing an increase in BPJS Kesehatan contributions to President Prabowo Subianto to suppress the deficit and prevent a default scenario. The last increase in BPJS Kesehatan contributions was in 2020.

marketNews.title: DATA Controlling Shareholder Reduces Stake via Stock Sale
marketNews.content: Remala Abadi Controlling Shareholder, Verah Wahyudi Singgih Wong, sold 28.3 million DATA shares at an average price of 552 rupiah per share on November 7-12, 2024. The total transaction value reached approximately 15.6 billion rupiah. After this transaction, Verah Wahyudi Singgih Wong's ownership in DATA decreased from 80.4% to 78.3%.

marketNews.title: NSSS Shareholder Sells 44 Million Shares Resulting in a Slight Decrease in Ownership
marketNews.content: Nusantara Sawit Sejahtera shareholder, PT Samuel Tumbuh Bersama, sold 44 million NSSS shares at an average price of 206 rupiah per share on November 8, 2024. The total transaction value reached approximately 9 billion rupiah. After this transaction, PT Samuel Tumbuh Bersama's ownership in NSSS decreased from 27% to 26.81%.

marketNews.title: RAJA Director Purchases 1.75 Million Shares
marketNews.content: Rukun Raharja Director, Ogi Rulino, purchased 1.75 million RAJA shares at a price of 1,355 rupiah per share on November 8, 2024. The total transaction value reached approximately 2.4 billion rupiah. After this transaction, Ogi Rulino's ownership in RAJA increased from 0% to 0.04%.

tickerNews.title: JPFA Predicts Chicken Meat Demand +24% YoY in 2025, Sees Program Absorption at 900,000 tons/year max
tickerNews.content: Senior Vice President Japfa Comfeed Indonesia, Achmad Dawami, said that his party predicts chicken meat demand in 2025 will increase up to +24% YoY, driven by the implementation of the free nutritious meal program. Meski demikian, Achmad meragukan program tersebut dapat mencapai target penyerapan daging ayam sebanyak 1,2 juta ton per tahun, sebagaimana yang disampaikan oleh dewan pakar Tim Kampanye Nasional Prabowo-Gibran. Berdasarkan proyeksi JPFA, penyerapan daging ayam dalam program makan bergizi gratis kemungkinan hanya sekitar 900.000 ton per tahun, di mana Achmad menyebut bahwa penyerapan sebesar 400.000 ton sudah berdampak bagus bagi perseroan.

tickerNews.title: SKRN to Distribute Interim Dividend of IDR 320.3 Billion with 9.7% Yield Indication
tickerNews.content: Superkrane Mitra Utama akan membagikan dividen interim tahun buku 2024 senilai 320,3 miliar rupiah atau 45 rupiah per saham. Cum date di pasar reguler dan negosiasi pada 22 November 2024, dengan pembayaran pada 6 Desember 2024. Mengacu harga saham SKRN pada penutupan bursa hari Kamis (14/11) di level 466 rupiah per lembar, maka indikasi dividend yield adalah 9,7%.

tickerNews.title: BUMI Announces 1.4 Million New Share Private Placement at IDR 157 per Share for Mandatory Convertible Bonds Execution
tickerNews.content: Bumi Resources mengumumkan akan menggelar private placement sebanyak 1,4 juta saham baru dengan harga 157 rupiah per lembar dalam rangka pelaksanaan obligasi wajib konversi. Pelaksanaan aksi korporasi ini akan berlangsung pada 21 November 2024.

tickerNews.title: PTRO Commissioner Erwin Ciputra Increased Holdings by 0.017% via Stock Purchase
tickerNews.content: Komisaris Petrosea, Erwin Ciputra, membeli 174.000 saham PTRO dengan harga rata-rata 18.363 rupiah per lembar pada 8 dan 11 November 2024. Total nilai transaksi mencapai ~3,2 miliar rupiah. Setelah transaksi ini, kepemilikan Erwin Ciputra di PTRO naik dari 0,045% menjadi 0,062%. Dalam transaksi berbeda, Direktur PTRO, Kartika Hendrawan, juga membeli 80.000 saham PTRO dengan harga rata-rata 19.445 rupiah per lembar pada 11 dan 12 November 2024. Total nilai transaksi mencapai ~1,6 miliar rupiah. Setelah transaksi ini, kepemilikan Kartika Hendrawan di PTRO naik dari 0,0088% menjadi 0,0167%.

tickerNews.title: ISAT and GOTO Launch Sahabat-AI, an Indonesian Language LLM Ecosystem
tickerNews.content: Indosat bekerja sama dengan GoTo Gojek Tokopedia ($GOTO) meluncurkan ekosistem large language model (LLM) bernama Sahabat-AI yang secara khusus dirancang dalam bahasa Indonesia. ISAT dan GOTO menyebut bahwa Sahabat-AI memungkinkan developer untuk menciptakan aplikasi dan layanan berbasis AI dalam bahasa Indonesia serta berbagai bahasa daerah. LLM open-source tersebut didukung oleh AI Singapore dan Tech Mahindra dari India, yang menggunakan software AI Enterprise dari Nvidia - termasuk Nvidia NeMo - untuk melatih model tersebut dan meningkatkan pemahaman bahasanya secara umum.

tickerNews.title: TOBA Director States Coal Reserves Will End by 2025-2027; No Extension or New Acquisition Planned
tickerNews.content: Direktur TBS Energi Utama, Juli Oktarina, mengatakan bahwa cadangan batu bara dari sejumlah konsesi tambang grup perseroan akan berakhir sekitar 2025-2027, meski izin kontrak tambang masih relatif panjang. Juli juga menyebut bahwa TOBA tidak berencana mengajukan perpanjangan kontrak untuk menggali potensi sumber daya batu bara, serta memastikan bahwa perseroan tidak berencana untuk mengakuisisi tambang batu bara lain. Meski demikian, Juli mengatakan bahwa TOBA telah mengantisipasi potensi penurunan pendapatan dari segmen batu bara lewat akuisisi beberapa proyek manajemen limbah dan investasi pada proyek energi baru terbarukan (EBT).

tickerNews.title: ITMG's 9M24 Coal Production Reached 15 Million Tons (+11.1% YoY), Sales Volume Reached 17.1 Million Tons (+12.5% YoY)
tickerNews.content: Indo Tambangraya Megah mencatatkan volume produksi batu bara sebesar 5,8 juta ton (+9,4% YoY, +34,9% QoQ) pada 3Q24, sehingga volume produksi batu bara selama 9M24 menjadi 15 juta ton (+11,1% YoY). Adapun volume penjualan pada 3Q24 tumbuh menjadi 6,3 juta ton (+18,9% YoY, +8,6% QoQ), sehingga volume penjualan selama 9M24 mencapai 17,1 juta ton (+12,5% YoY).

tickerNews.title: ANTM Plans 35-40% Payout Ratio for 2024 Dividends, Lower than 2023's 100% to Fund Projects
tickerNews.content: Direktur Aneka Tambang, Arianto Sabtonugroho Rudjito, mengatakan bahwa pihaknya berencana membagikan dividen tahun buku 2024 dengan payout ratio sekitar 35-40%, lebih rendah dibandingkan payout ratio saat dividen tahun buku 2023 di level 100%. Arianto menyebut bahwa rencana penurunan payout ratio tersebut mempertimbangkan kebutuhan pendanaan untuk sejumlah proyek perseroan ke depan. Selama 2024 sendiri, ANTM telah melancarkan sejumlah ekspansi, seperti peluncuran smelter grade alumina refinery (SGAR) Mempawah dan akuisisi 30% saham perusahaan nikel afiliasi Eternal Tsingshan Group, PT Jiu Long Metal Industry.

tickerNews.title: BBTN to Partner with BBRI for President Prabowo's 3 Million House Program
tickerNews.content: Direktur Utama Bank Tabungan Negara ($BBTN), Nixon L. P. Napitupulu, mengatakan bahwa pihaknya akan bekerja sama dengan Bank Rakyat Indonesia ($BBRI) untuk merealisasikan program penyediaan 3 juta unit rumah per tahun yang diusung Presiden Prabowo Subianto. Nixon menyebut bahwa kolaborasi ini dilakukan dengan mempertimbangkan jangkauan jaringan BBRI yang lebih luas hingga ke pelosok Indonesia. Terkait pembagian pembiayaan antara BBTN dan BBRI, Nixon menyebut bahwa hal tersebut masih belum diputuskan dan akan menunggu keputusan dari menteri. Nixon juga menerangkan bahwa program 3 juta rumah per tahun tidak akan seluruhnya mengandalkan skema kredit pemilikan rumah (KPR), dengan sebagian di antaranya akan disalurkan dalam bentuk bantuan.

tickerNews.title: DRMA in Communication with BYD for Automotive Component Supply Cooperation
tickerNews.content: Direktur Dharma Polimetal ($DRMA), Yosaphat Simanjuntak, mengatakan bahwa pihaknya sudah menjalin komunikasi dengan BYD terkait kemungkinan kerja sama penyediaan komponen otomotif. Meski demikian, Yosaphat belum dapat membeberkan informasi lebih lanjut terkait hal itu. Sementara itu, Direktur Utama DRMA, Irianto Santoso, mengatakan bahwa pihaknya sedang menjalin kerja sama dengan produsen kendaraan dari China, meski dia tidak menyebut identitasnya. Sejauh ini, DRMA telah memasok komponen otomotif ke sejumlah pabrikan mobil seperti Hyundai, Kia, dan Toyota, serta untuk kendaraan roda dua seperti PT Astra Honda Motor (AHM).

tickerNews.title: DATA Controlling Shareholder Reduces Stake by 2.1%
tickerNews.content: Pengendali Remala Abadi ($DATA), Verah Wahyudi Singgih Wong, menjual 28,3 juta saham DATA dengan harga rata-rata 552 rupiah per lembar pada 7-12 November 2024. Total nilai transaksi mencapai ~15,6 miliar rupiah. Setelah transaksi ini, kepemilikan Verah Wahyudi Singgih Wong di DATA turun dari 80,4% menjadi 78,3%.

tickerNews.title: NSSS Shareholder PT Samuel Tumbuh Bersama Sells 44 Million Shares
tickerNews.content: Pemegang saham Nusantara Sawit Sejahtera ($NSSS), PT Samuel Tumbuh Bersama, menjual 44 juta saham NSSS dengan harga rata-rata 206 rupiah per lembar pada 8 November 2024. Total nilai transaksi mencapai ~9 miliar rupiah. Setelah transaksi ini, kepemilikan PT Samuel Tumbuh Bersama di NSSS turun dari 27% menjadi 26,81%.

tickerNews.title: RAJA Director Ogi Rulino Buys 1.75 Million Shares
tickerNews.content: Direktur Rukun Raharja ($RAJA), Ogi Rulino, membeli 1,75 juta saham RAJA dengan harga 1.355 rupiah per lembar pada 8 November 2024. Total nilai transaksi mencapai ~2,4 miliar rupiah. Setelah transaksi ini, kepemilikan Ogi Rulino di RAJA naik dari 0% menjadi 0,04%.
